<WebPart xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/WebPart/v2">
            <Title>About Us</Title>
            <FrameType>TitleBarOnly</FrameType>
            <Description>About Us Web Part</Description>
            <FrameState>Normal</FrameState>
            <Assembly>Microsoft.SharePoint, Version=14.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=71e9bce111e9429c</Assembly>
            <TypeName>Microsoft.SharePoint.WebPartPages.ContentEditorWebPart</TypeName>
            <ContentLink xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/WebPart/v2/ContentEditor" />
            <Content xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/WebPart/v2/ContentEditor">
              <table width="100%" cellpadding="5" >
                <tr>
                  <td height="200" >                   
                    <div align="justify">
                      <ul>
                        <li>Suspendisse laoreet, nulla vitae volutpat commodo, nulla nunc porta risus</li>
                        <li>Eget laoreet nunc augue in felis. Quisque sed felis felis, a dictum felis</li>
                        <li>Nullam vulputate rhoncus odio, vitae tincidunt nisl vehicula eget.</li>
                        <li>Nulla porta condimentum lacus eu adipiscing. Aliquam nec tellus eu lectus ultrices consequat et nec turpis. </li>
                        <li>Ut dignissim elit. Vivamus augue libero, varius.</li>
                        <li>Nulla porta condimentum lacus eu adipiscing. Aliquam nec tellus eu lectus ultrices consequat et nec turpis. </li>
                        <li>Suspendisse laoreet, nulla vitae volutpat commodo, nulla nunc porta risus, eget laoreet nunc augue in felis</li>
                        <li>Integer commodo dui id nulla accumsan ullamcorper. Donec eu urna id lorem venenatis vestibulum</li>
                      </ul>
                    </div>
                    </br>
                    <div align="right">
                      <A title="More..." href="~site/Pages/AboutUs.aspx" target="">More...</A>
                    </div>
                  </td>
                </tr>
              </table>
            </Content>
            <PartStorage xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/WebPart/v2/ContentEditor" />
          </WebPart>

Property.Name: PublishingPageContent
Property.Value:
Thanks

Your inquiry has been received and will be handled quickly and appropriately.

If you sent your inquiry during standard business hours we try our best to reply to all inquiries before we leave for the day. If you sent your inquiry while we are not in the office, we will get back to you as quickly as possible the next business day.
